abstract: Everett Ellin, who pushed museums into electronic age by computerizing art catalogs, dies at age 82.
snippet: Mr. Ellin helped bring about the reluctant marriage between the conservative world of art museums and the wild frontier of information technology.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Ellin helped bring about the reluctant marriage between the conservative world of art museums and the wild frontier of information technology.

headline.main: Everett Ellin Dies at 82; Helped Computerize Art Catalogs
headline.print_headline: Everett Ellin, 82, a Pioneer In Computerizing Art Catalogs
headline.seo: Everett Ellin Dies at 82; Helped Computerize Art Catalogs
